document_data.name: ''Reverse Rain Cloak''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Reverse rain cloak''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[cloak]] of dubious magical properties.
document_data.Powers: This clock possessed an enchantment that made its wearer always slightly damp.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a ''reverse rain cloak'' was displayed among splendorous enchanted rewards for those willing to partake in [[Akabi]]'s Wheel of Fortune game in the [[Circus of the Last Days]] during its stay in the [[Baldur's Gate/Rivington|Rivington]] neighborhood of [[Baldur's Gate]].
